meanings.definition: A sweet fruit dessert thickened with starch.
meanings.sent1: The kissel was a delicious treat after dinner.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed a bowl of kissel made with fresh berries.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they tried to eat the kissel without using their hands.
meanings.sent4: The kissel was a colorful masterpiece on the dessert table.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the kissel filled the kitchen, tempting everyone to have a taste.

meanings.definition: To make a sweet fruit dessert thickened with starch.
meanings.sent1: She decided to kissel the ripe peaches for a special occasion.
meanings.sent2: Every summer, they kissel a variety of fruits for their family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: He playfully challenged his friend to a kissel-making contest.
meanings.sent4: The chef expertly kisselled the dessert, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The kitchen was filled with laughter as they kisselled the sweet treat together.
